Upskilling challenges can hinder your organization’s growth prospects.
Convert them into opportunities by joining hands with us.
Meet Edstellar

Your Trusted Corporate Training Company for Global Instructor-Led Training

The rapid pace of digital and technological transformation is reshaping the way businesses operate, making workforce upskilling not just important, but mission-critical. In a world where change is constant, impactful and continuous learning has become a strategic priority. Instructor-led training, especially in the post-COVID era, is proving to be one of the most effective ways to drive real learning outcomes and build adaptable, future-ready teams.

Edstellar is your trusted partner in this transformation, a one-stop corporate training company delivering scalable, high-quality instructor-led training across the globe. With a network of 10,000+ verified, certified trainers, we offer flexible, cost-effective on-site and virtual learning solutions tailored to your organization’s goals. Our client-centric approach, global trainer accessibility, and robust training management capabilities set us apart as a leading force in corporate learning and development.

Know More About Edstellar

Maximize Training ROI with Edstellar’s Corporate Training Services

Training Management Platform
Edstellar Training Management Platform is an innovative system to organize, track, and optimize organizational training initiatives.
Training Delivery & Training Administration
5000+ Trainers with Domain Experience
Boosts Learner Participation by 50%
Scale Training by 5x - 10x
Consistent Training Quality
Deliver In-person Training across 1000+ Locations
Reduce Training Admin Overhead by 25%
Hassle-free Training Coordination
Unified
Solution

Reduce Training Cost by 15% - 30%

One Dashboard for all your Corporate Training needs

Improve your training scheduling and administration capability with Edstellar Corporate Training Platform. The customizable and easy-to-use dashboard offers features that help in effectively managing and speeding-up corporate training initiatives.

We Have the Right Trainers to Match Your Training Needs

The success of your learning initiatives largely depends on the Corporate Training Provider you choose. At Edstellar, we deliver tailored curriculum designs, expert facilitators, cutting-edge learning technologies, and data-driven assessment tools that guarantee measurable results aligned with your business goals. We have hand-picked qualified, certified, verified and highly experienced trainers with diverse domain expertise all-set to bridge organizational skilling gaps anywhere, anytime.
